basics.name: Aisylu Shakirova
basics.label: Frontend developer
basics.summary: I'm a passionate web developer in Berlin. Three years ago I started to learn programming and became a developer. My specialization is frontend and I also have experience in backend development.

highlights: Developing web sites using JavaScript framework Vue.js for frontend, Python framework Flask-RESTful for backend, ORM Flask-SQLAlchemy for working with PostgreSQL.
Developing user authorization,
Working with backend using API,
Sending emails with the service SendGrid,
Integration with logging service Sentry,
Deploying to Heroku.
Creating a mockup for the website.
Also developing landing pages using JQuery, HTML, Less, Gulp.

work.summary: The German based technology leader in device management, TR-069, and IoT solutions for service providers, enterprises, and OEMs.
highlights: Developing python tools for  ACS and developing test cases
Coding on Python2
Configuration development for Wi-Fi routers
Integration these devices with the company's system using the TR-069 protocol
Automation of the router configuration process.
Writing custom scripts within the scope of integration tasks of the company's system (Support Portal Axiros) with Wi-Fi  routers

work.summary: Development landing pages on freelance. Studying Java programming language.

highlights: Developing landing pages. Developing multi-page portals on CMS 1C-Bitrix
Website development, mainly landing pages, multi-page sites using CMS 1C-Bitrix.
Adaptive and cross-browser layout using HTML5, CSS, JQuery, Bootstrap, Uikit, Less, Gulp, less PHP and JavaScript.

work.summary: Design, supply, construction of industrial boilers and mini-CHP
highlights: Design of large and medium capacity boiler houses (up to 30 MW). Designing of power centres with GTU application.  Aerodynamic calculation of the gas-air tract of installations.
Selection of equipment, designing of the principal and design scheme, agreement with the customer, developing of schemes and drawings

Designing of heat networks: a selection of tracing, placement of fixed supports, the calculation for strength and stability; development of the circuit, a profile of the route, nodes and specifications, calculation of heat loss, the performance of the UDC system, etc

education.institution: Kazan Power Engineering University, Kazan, Russia
